alert.note: Alert for Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Yates County through 715 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rushville, or 9 miles southeast of Canandaigua, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Potter, Middlesex, Rushville and Vine Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
